name: GRAVITY WRONG
description:
GET WRONG!
GRAVITY WRONG is a 2-4P local multiplayer gunfight, and will prob be enjoyed by fans of games like of Towerfall, Duck Game, and Samurai Gunn. EXHIBITION MATCH
  • Get some friends together and fire up an exhibition match. Exhibition matches can be played using any of four different special modes and provide immediate, on-demand access to all sixteen GRAVITY WRONG arenas nationwide.
TOURNAMENT MODE
  • Vibe out for like ten minutes with tournament mode using standard GRAVITY WRONG rules in the Eastern, Northern, Southern, or Western conference championships to unlock trophies and stars a la MarioKart.

GRAVITY WRONG created by Don Boody using Scirra's Construct 2 and with music by Tim Crowe

READ BEFORE DOWNLOAD:

This is a 2-4 player game and it supports Xbox360 controllers only. There is no single player mode. If you don't have 2 or more Xbox360 controllers to hook up to your computer (either directly or with a wireless adapter), thank you for checking this game out but I don't recommend downloading it.

You can currently download this game for free, but don't let that stop you from tossing us a fiver anyhow. We spent all our money on hott new outfits.

Windows users should run dxwebsetup.exe before running the game file on the very first launch.

UPDATE NOTES:

5/14/2016 - GRAVITY WRONG 2.1: P2 ANIMATION FIX EDITION is now live! This update fixes a bug that was frigging up the p2 animations so bad that it looked like you didn't have powers WHEN YOU REALLY DID SOMETIMES.
